tooltip-last-diff: Previous diff [Left square bracket or p]
settings-confirm-lang: To apply language changes you need to reload the application.
settings-language-region-descr: Set region to show numbers and dates in local format.
settings-sound-descr: Change sound mode for incoming edits and messages in talk.
settings-revisions-descr: Set alert or open all consecutive edits by same user at once.
settings-direction-descr: Show edits from bottom to top direction in queue.
settings-rh-mode-descr: Show queue location on the right side of screen.
settings-terminate-stream-descr: Terminate recent changes stream when queue limit reaches.
settings-jumps-descr: If enabled, SWViewer focus will jump directly to change when opening diff from queue.
settings-hotkeys-descr: Enable [$1|hotkeys] to operate SWViewer with keyboard.
settings-limit-descr: Max count of edits allowed to load in queue.
presets-new-desc: Enable edits that are new pages creations.
presets-only-new-desc: Show only new page creations edits.
presets-edits-limit-desc: The number of edits after which edits of a user will be skipped.
presets-days-limit-desc: Account age in days after which edits of a user will be skipped.
presets-ns-desc: Add [$1|namespace] to filter edits in queue. Example: 0 for Main
presets-additional-desc: Enable edits from [$1|wikis] with less then 300 active users.
presets-custom-desc: Add your home-wiki or wikis which are not in small wikis list. Example: enwiki
presets-langset-desc: Set languages to get edits in specific languages. Example: en
presets-wikis-wl-desc: Add wikis to skip their edits from the queue. Example: enwiki
presets-users-wl-desc: Add users to skip their edits from the queue. Example: JohnDoe
presets-default-q: We don't recommend you to delete default preset!
presets-invalid-title-desc: This preset title is not valid. Please try using "A-Z, a-z, 0-9, (), [], {}, -, _".
presets-invalid-edits-limit-desc: Edit limit should be numeric and non-empty.
presets-invalid-days-limit-desc: Days limit should be numeric and non-empty.
presets-invalid-ores-limit-desc: ORES score should be numeric and non-empty.
nc-unlogin-error: Something wrong happened! Please check your internet connection.
error-cant-perform: Can't perform this action, this edit is not the latest revision.
gsr-success-content: $1 has been successfully reported to GSR for deletion.
warn-success-content: $1 has been warned for edit on $2.
request-performed-content: Request for $1 on $2 has been performed successfully.
rollback-fail-content: $1 has made multiple edits on $2. Please check the page history first.
rollback-fail-not-latest: Can not perform this action, this edit on $1 is not the latest revision.
warn-perform-fail: A warning for edit on $1 has failed. Looks like config is not defined correctly.
warn-performed-content: $1 has been successfully warned for edit on $2.
report-fail-content: Report for edit on $1 has failed. Looks like config is not define correctly.
report-already-reported: The user has been already reported.
autoreport-content: $1 has been warned multiple times. Do you want to report them to the Admin Noticeboard?
report-performed-content: $1 has been successfully reported for edit on $2.
browser-sse: Sorry, your browser does not support Server-Sent Events.
already-done: Such changes have been made already.
error-rollback-browser: Rollback error. Please open page in the new tab. Error code: $1
error-opening-del: Opening error. Looks like this page has been deleted.
error-get-source: Failed http-request. Either this page has been deleted or server is down.
error-network-first-editor: Network error: Unable to get first editor.
error-get-url: Unable to get url to count warn
error-opening-del-spec: Opening error. Looks like this page has been deleted. Server error info: $1
error-get-last: Unable to get last user revision id.
error-already-reverted: This edit has already been reverted.
error-del: Opening error. This page has been deleted.
warn-user-desc: Turning this on will left a warning on the user talk page after clicking common summaries (green only).
treat-undo-desc: Enable checkbox if you want to use undo instead of rollback.
max-warn-desc: Enable checkbox to send maximum level of warning.
sysops-wait: Maybe it's better to wait for the reaction of the local sysop.
sysops-not-gs: It is not a global sysop wiki.
sysops-more-than-3: This wiki have more than 3 active sysop (total $1).
sysops-more-than-10: This wiki have more than 10 active sysop.
welcome-frame-reminder-cache: IMPORTANT: If app is not working properly, please re-login and clear cache.
welcome-frame-reminder-respons: Responsibility for edits rests with the owner of the account with which they are made.
welcome-frame-reminder-warns: Please DO NOT revert if you don't know the language (except in case of pure vandalism).
welcome-frame-reminder-bugs: If you find a bug, please [$1|report] it!
welcome-frame-reminder-screens: Also attach screenshots or/and data from the browser console.
welcome-frame-tips-pwa: If you use Chrome browser, you can install SWViewer as an WebApp on desktop as well as mobile, see [$1|instructions].
welcome-frame-tips-manual: Don't know how to patrol with SWViewer? See [$1|manual page].
welcome-frame-changelog: For list of changes to tool, see [$1|Changelog].
welcome-frame-irc: You can also join our [$1|IRC channel] or [$2|discord server].
welcome-frame-tagger: Some helpful scripts/templates for patrolling: [$1|Tagger], [$2|Warning templates].
about-frame-app: $1 is an app to monitor the recent changes of a wiki in real-time.
about-frame-q: Any questions, please ask at SWViewer [$1|talk page] on Meta-wiki.
about-frame-cookies-desc: This app uses cookies, which expires after 31 days.
about-frame-translators-tw: Translating SWViewer interface to $1 language is done at [$link|Translatewiki.net].
about-frame-translators-tw-base: Translating SWViewer interface to other languages is done at [$link|Translatewiki.net].
about-frame-disc-1: By using this project, you agree that any private information you give to this project may be made publicly available and not be treated as confidential. By using this project, you agree that the volunteer administrators of this project will have access to any data you submit and any information that you send. The volunteer administrators of this project are bound by the Wikimedia Cloud Services Terms of Use, and are not allowed to share this information or use it in any non-approved way.
about-frame-disc-2: Since access to this information is fundamental to the operation of Wikimedia Cloud Services, these terms regarding use of your data expressly override the Wikimedia Foundation's Privacy Policy as it relates to the use and access of your personal information.
about-frame-data-desc: Application collects and stores the following data:
about-frame-data-settings: User settings of tool and name of their presets
about-frame-data-stats: Stats of user actions via tool (i.e. reverts, undo, edit, warn, RFD, etc)
about-frame-data-logs: Logs of on-wiki actions which are performed via tool (i.e. diff, date)
about-frame-data-ref-1: This data may be available to the Wikimedia Foundation, its volunteers and Wikimedia Cloud Services users.
about-frame-data-ref-2: This data is available to the public.
about-frame-data-ref-3: This data deletes in two weeks after last access of tool.
login-rights: To use this application [$1|local] or [$2|global] rollback is required.
login-disclaimer: By clicking on the "OAuth Login" button, you agree to our [$1|Cookie and Privacy policy].
